tool_description: Using this API you can check if crypto address is valid or not.
name: Crypto address validator
title: Crypto address validator

api_list.name: isCurrencyValidatable
api_list.description: Check if currency exist in a validation list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-address-validator.p.rapidapi.com/isCurrencyValidatable/dot"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-address-validator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-address-validator.p.rapidapi.com/isCurrencyValidatable/{currency}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-address-validator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getValidatableCurrencyList
